decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:
Site Plan - Location Map, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-101, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Existing Floor Plans, Drawing No. HR-R00-EX-102, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Existing Floor Plans, Drawing No. HR-R00-EX-103, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Existing Elevations, Drawing No. HR-R00-EX-104, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Existing Elevations, Drawing No. HR-R00-EX-105, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Proposed Floor Plans, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-102, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Proposed Floor Plans, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-103, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Proposed Elevations, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-104, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Proposed Elevations, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-105, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Proposed Sections, Drawing No. HR-R00-PR-106, Rev. R00, dated 27 September 2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey side and rear extension and changes to fenestration including new front door (following demolition of existing extension and garage)
